page.title: 061985 Boundary Walk
page.content: {THE ROUTE}has three stages. 1-Ouse Bridge through Messingermire to Park Wood. 2-on to Dash Falls. 3-over Skiddaw through Dodd, and down to St. Bega's church. To complete the Parish Boundary it is neccessary to swim or sail down the middle of the lake. I went on the hard third stage. I signed my name in. We went to the top of Dash and on upward following a fence. The top of the slope was just level with only a few more mounds to the summit. We followed flags, and it was very welcoming to see the top of Skiddaw (3,054ft.) and to sit down under the shelter of stone walling and have our dinner. Linda age 11. I did the first stage. We went across fields climbed fences up little hills crossed a main road and scrambled through woods. By the end I was very tired. Diane age 11.
